name: Pong (itch) (Raven)
description:
Game description:

This is a replica of the classic Pong game. The creation was low effort made in just a few hours.

This is made for 2 players, there is no scoreboard (im not the greatest at making games as you can probably tell)

The ball will get faster progressively until someone scores

Controls:

Left Paddle - Player 1 - W to move up and S to move down

Right Paddle - Player 2 - Up and down arrow keys to move
